Articles.Content:
Just wondering about the average age of players and how long they have been playing for.

Edit: I am 15 and have played for 4 months now.

Edited November 10, 2013 by rholtsla98

Just wondering about the average age of players and how long they have been playing for.

Since .8.1 (I think)... Let's just say waaaay back.

...and I'm an immature 39, still loving the hell out of this game!

The first version I ever saw played was 0.8.4; the first version I myself played was 0.11. I got my forum account pretty much at the same time I started playing KSP, so around 2 years now.

EDIT: Odds are good I'm at least twice the age of almost everyone here, incidentally: 32.

Edited November 10, 2013 by SkyRender

playing since December 27th.

Edited November 10, 2013 by Spartwo

I think .12 (Before Spaceplanes and the Tracking Station, but after the Mun was added).

An insignificant 15 years old and have been playing the game for about 1 year and ~3 months
Since 0.18, so about a year. Before that it was Orbiter, starting around 2003. As for my age, somewhere between 40 and 904.
18. Played since 0.13.3. I'm an old soldier
I have been playing since .15, have tried 0.7.3 though. By the way, I am nearly 15 now.
I'm 15, and I've played since 0.8 or so. I made my forum account much later.

Played since around 0.13. Watched the forum for a while before I registered and started posting.

And i'm 23 years young.
Played since March 2012,, hopped on the forums about a month later, got an account in May. I've been on the forums about as much as ive actually played KSP...

I first played ksp around 0.13 but lost interest, i later came back when 0.18 came out since then i'm hooked.

And i'm 20 years old.
15, have played since a few days after the release of 0.16.
37 years old, bought KSP sometime around 0.17 or 0.18, been playing actively since 0.20.
I'm 13, and I've been playing KSP since circa .13. I got ksp during the .14 days.. I think

Been playing since about May 2012 (version 0.15 I think) and I'm 31 (with the mental age of Jeb).

This thread reminded me to check my youtube demographics. These are the results for the last 365 days;
Been playing since late 0.19. my age? classified. (between 1 and 4 billion)
Im 13 and ive played since .20. I got interested in the game at about .15 then I forgot about it then I came back (I wish I had got the game in .15).

I'm 14 and found the game pre-Mun(don't know which version) but next week they added the Mun. Then I forgot about it then came across it again on kurtjmac's videos, remembered it and bought 0.14 still can't land on the stupid Mun though XD.
21, been playing since about 2-3 months before my join date here.

0.14 is when I started.

I'm 13 and been playing for about 2 years
I only started two months ago with 0.21 (it feels like more, though). 20 years old.
I'm 41 (yes, seriously), and I've been playing more or less non-stop since late August of this year.
Started playing 0.7.3, joined forums bit later. Took a long hiatus between 0.13 and steam release. Was quite surprised to find my forum account still alive.

Age some were between 15 and 7 playing since 18.

Edited November 10, 2013 by Dooz
Grammar fixes
